Q3.3_1: Would the following motivate you to get an ORCID iD? - If it was used by more publishers or funders
Q3.3_2: Would the following motivate you to get an ORCID iD? - If it was used during submission of work within the University
Q3.3_3: Would the following motivate you to get an ORCID iD? - If it was used as identifier in to automatically detect my research outputs for assessment exercises
Q3.3_4: Would the following motivate you to get an ORCID iD? - If I knew more about who ORCID iDs are used by and what for.
Q3.3_5: Would the following motivate you to get an ORCID iD? - If it was easier to sign up and maintain it.
Q3.3_6: Would the following motivate you to get an ORCID iD? - If it saved me time through automatic information sharing
Q3.3_7: Would the following motivate you to get an ORCID iD? - If I could use it on other online platforms to fill out forms
Q3.3_8: Would the following motivate you to get an ORCID iD? - If I could be reassured about privacy concerns
Q3.3_9: Would the following motivate you to get an ORCID iD? - If they would be displayed more prominently on University web pages
Q3.3_10: Would the following motivate you to get an ORCID iD? - If someone would show me how to use it
